{{cpp/experimental/fs/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl|since=fs_ts|1=
struct space_info {
    uintmax_t capacity;
    uintmax_t free; 
    uintmax_t available; 
};
}}
{{dcl end}}

Represents the filesystem information as determined by {{rlp|space}}.

The members have the following meaning:
* {{tt|capacity}} -- total size of the filesystem, in bytes
* {{tt|free}} -- free space on the filesystem, in bytes
* {{tt|available}} --  free space available to a non-privileged process (may be equal or less than {{tt|free}})
